title: WL Martin Plan 24433
summary: Single-story barndominium with open living spaces and flexible workshop or storage areas.
description: Plan 24433 embraces the barndominium lifestyle with a versatile open floor plan designed for both living and working. The single-story layout features high ceilings, expansive windows, and minimal interior walls to maximize flexibility. Perfect for rural homesites or those seeking a workshop-adjacent living space. Metal building exterior options provide durability and low maintenance.
